dc_title_s: A Chronological chart of ancient, modern and Biblical history
dc_description_s: Cover title: Adams' synchronological chart or map of history. Includes illus., port., etc.|3rd ed., carefully and critically rev. and brought down to 1878.|Color table on sheet ; 70 x 677 cm, folded to 70 x 35 cm.|Not drawn to scale.|General Map Collection
